verses.verse: וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> fell יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> And Joseph עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> face אָבִ֑יו <WH1> upon his father's וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <WH1058> and wept עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> over וַיִּשַּׁק־ <WH5401> upon him and kissed לֽוֹ׃

וַיְצַ֨ו <WH6680> commanded יוֹסֵ֤ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> his servants אֶת־ <WH853> הָרֹ֣פְאִ֔ים <WH7495> the physicians לַחֲנֹ֖ט <WH2590> to embalm אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וַיַּחַנְט֥וּ <WH2590> embalmed הָרֹפְאִ֖ים <WH7495> and the physicians אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיִּמְלְאוּ־ <WH4390> were fulfilled לוֹ֙ אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> And forty י֔וֹם <WH3117> days כִּ֛י <WH3588> for כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> such יִמְלְא֖וּ <WH4390> for him for so are fulfilled יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> the days הַחֲנֻטִ֑ים <WH2590> of those which are embalmed וַיִּבְכּ֥וּ <WH1058> mourned אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4713> Egyptian שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> for him threescore and ten יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> days

וַיַּֽעַבְרוּ֙ <WH5674> were past יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> And when the days בְכִית֔וֹ <WH1068> of his mourning וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> Joseph אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> unto the house פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אִם־ <WH518> If נָ֨א <WH4994> now מָצָ֤אתִי <WH4672> If now I have found חֵן֙ <WH2580> grace בְּעֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5869> in your eyes דַּבְּרוּ־ <WH1696> speak נָ֕א <WH4994> please בְּאָזְנֵ֥י <WH241> I pray you in the ears פַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אָבִ֞י <WH1> My father הִשְׁבִּיעַ֣נִי <WH7650> made me swear לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Lo אָנֹכִי֮ <WH595> I מֵת֒ <WH4191> I die בְּקִבְרִ֗י <WH6913> in my grave אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which כָּרִ֤יתִי <WH3738> which I have digged לִי֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> for me in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> there תִּקְבְּרֵ֑נִי <WH6912> there shalt thou bury me וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now אֶֽעֱלֶה־ <WH5927> Now therefore let me go up נָּ֛א <WH4994> please וְאֶקְבְּרָ֥ה <WH6912> I pray thee and bury אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֖י <WH1> my father וְאָשֽׁוּבָה׃ <WH7725> and I will come again

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh עֲלֵ֛ה <WH5927> Go up וּקְבֹ֥ר <WH6912> and bury אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> thy father כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he הִשְׁבִּיעֶֽךָ׃ <WH7650> according as he made thee swear

וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> went up יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> And Joseph לִקְבֹּ֣ר <WH6912> to bury אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וַיַּֽעֲל֨וּ <WH5927> and with him went up אִתּ֜וֹ <WH854> up כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַבְדֵ֤י <WH5650> all the servants פַרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> of Pharaoh זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> the elders בֵית֔וֹ <WH1004> of his house וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> and all the elders אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> And all the house יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> of Joseph וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> and his brethren וּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֑יו <WH1> and his father's רַ֗ק <WH7535> but טַפָּם֙ <WH2945> only their little ones וְצֹאנָ֣ם <WH6629> and their flocks וּבְקָרָ֔ם <WH1241> and their herds עָזְב֖וּ <WH5800> they left בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <WH1657> of Goshen

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> And there went up עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with גַּם־ <WH1571> both רֶ֖כֶב <WH7393> with him both chariots גַּם־ <WH1571> both פָּרָשִׁ֑ים <WH6571> and horsemen וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> company כָּבֵ֥ד <WH3515> great מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> and it was a very

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> And they came עַד־ <WH5704> against גֹּ֣רֶן <WH1637> to the threshingfloor הָאָטָ֗ד <WH329> of Atad אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> which [is] beyond הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan וַיִּ֨סְפְּדוּ־ <WH5594> and there they mourned שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there מִסְפֵּ֛ד <WH4553> lamentation גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> with a great וְכָבֵ֖ד <WH3515> sore מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and very וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> and he made לְאָבִ֛יו <WH1> for his father אֵ֖בֶל <WH60> a mourning שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וַיַּ֡רְא <WH7200> saw יוֹשֵׁב֩ <WH3427> And when the inhabitants הָאָ֨רֶץ <WH776> of the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֜י <WH3669> the Canaanites אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵ֗בֶל <WH60> the mourning בְּגֹ֙רֶן֙ <WH1637> in the floor הָֽאָטָ֔ד <WH329> of Atad וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> they said אֵֽבֶל־ <WH60> mourning כָּבֵ֥ד <WH3515> This [is] a grievous זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This לְמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4713> Egyptian עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> after that קָרָ֤א <WH7121> was called שְׁמָהּ֙ <WH8034> wherefore the name of it אָבֵ֣ל מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH67> Abelmizraim אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> which [is] beyond הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> Jordan
וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> did בָנָ֖יו <WH1121> And his sons ל֑וֹ כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> Thus כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he צִוָּֽם׃ <WH6680> unto him according as he commanded

וַיִּשְׂא֨וּ <WH5375> carried אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> בָנָיו֙ <WH1121> For his sons אַ֣רְצָה <WH776> him into the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַיִּקְבְּר֣וּ <WH6912> and buried אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> בִּמְעָרַ֖ת <WH4631> him in the cave שְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> of the field הַמַּכְפֵּלָ֑ה <WH4375> of Machpelah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which קָנָה֩ <WH7069> bought אַבְרָהָ֨ם <WH85> which Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׂדֶ֜ה <WH7704> with the field לַאֲחֻזַּת־ <WH272> for a possession קֶ֗בֶר <WH6913> of a buryingplace מֵאֵ֛ת <WH853> עֶפְרֹ֥ן <WH6085> of Ephron הַחִתִּ֖י <WH2850> the Hittite עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before מַמְרֵֽא׃ <WH4471> Mamre

וַיָּ֨שָׁב <WH7725> returned יוֹסֵ֤ף <WH3130> And Joseph מִצְרַ֙יְמָה֙ <WH4714> into Egypt ה֣וּא <WH1931> he וְאֶחָ֔יו <WH251> he and his brethren וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעֹלִ֥ים <WH5927> and all that went up אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> he לִקְבֹּ֣ר <WH6912> with him to bury אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after קָבְר֥וֹ <WH6913> grave אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

וַיִּרְא֤וּ <WH7200> saw אֲחֵֽי־ <WH251> brethren יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And when Joseph's כִּי־ <WH3588> for מֵ֣ת <WH4191> was dead אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> that their father וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> they said ל֥וּ <WH3863> will peradventure יִשְׂטְמֵ֖נוּ <WH7852> hate us יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> Joseph וְהָשֵׁ֤ב <WH7725> and will certainly יָשִׁיב֙ <WH7725> requite לָ֔נוּ אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> for all הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> us all the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which גָּמַ֖לְנוּ <WH1580> which we did אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיְצַוּ֕וּ <WH6680> And they sent a messenger אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> unto Joseph לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אָבִ֣יךָ <WH1> Thy father צִוָּ֔ה <WH6680> did command לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before מוֹת֖וֹ <WH4194> he died לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus תֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> So shall ye say לְיוֹסֵ֗ף <WH3130> unto Joseph אָ֣נָּ֡א <WH577> I pray thee שָׂ֣א <WH5375> Forgive נָ֠א <WH4994> Please פֶּ֣שַׁע <WH6588> now the trespass אַחֶ֤יךָ <WH251> of thy brethren וְחַטָּאתָם֙ <WH2403> and their sin כִּי־ <WH3588> thee רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> unto thee evil גְמָל֔וּךָ <WH1580> for they did וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> henceforth שָׂ֣א <WH5375> and now we pray thee forgive נָ֔א <WH4994> please לְפֶ֥שַׁע <WH6588> the trespass עַבְדֵ֖י <WH5650> of the servants אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> of the God אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> of thy father וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <WH1058> wept יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> And Joseph בְּדַבְּרָ֥ם <WH1696> when they spake אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about

וַיֵּלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> came גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> And his brethren וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> and fell down לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> before his face וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and they said הִנֶּ֥נּֽוּ <WH2009> Behold לְךָ֖ לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> Behold we [be] thy servants

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֛ם <WH413> But יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> And Joseph אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֑אוּ <WH3372> unto them Fear כִּ֛י <WH3588> for הֲתַ֥חַת <WH8478> Thahash אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God's אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

וְאַתֶּ֕ם <WH859> you חֲשַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH2803> But as for you ye thought עָלַ֖י <WH5921> against רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> evil אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> against me [but] God חֲשָׁבָ֣הּ <WH2803> meant it לְטֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> unto good לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> to עֲשֹׂ֛ה <WH6213> bring to pass כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as [it is] this day הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this לְהַחֲיֹ֥ת <WH2421> alive עַם־ <WH5971> people רָֽב׃ <WH7227> much

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> So אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּירָ֔אוּ <WH3372> Now therefore fear אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I אֲכַלְכֵּ֥ל <WH3557> ye not I will nourish אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> טַפְּכֶ֑ם <WH2945> you and your little ones וַיְנַחֵ֣ם <WH5162> And he comforted אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וַיְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> them and spake עַל־ <WH5921> and לִבָּֽם׃ <WH3820> kindly

וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> in Egypt ה֖וּא <WH1931> he וּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֑יו <WH1> he and his father's וַיְחִ֣י <WH2421> lived יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> and Joseph מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> an hundred וָעֶ֖שֶׂר <WH6235> and ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> saw יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> Ephraim's בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> children שִׁלֵּשִׁ֑ים <WH8029> of the third גַּ֗ם <WH1571> also בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> [generation] the children מָכִיר֙ <WH4353> also of Machir בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh יֻלְּד֖וּ <WH3205> were brought up עַל־ <WH5921> and בִּרְכֵּ֥י <WH1290> knees יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> upon Joseph's

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> unto his brethren אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I מֵ֑ת <WH4191> I die וֵֽאלֹהִ֞ים <WH430> and God פָּקֹ֧ד <WH6485> will surely יִפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> visit אֶתְכֶ֗ם <WH853> וְהֶעֱלָ֤ה <WH5927> you and bring you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> at הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> of this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֛ע <WH7650> which he sware לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> and to Jacob

וַיַּשְׁבַּ֣ע <WH7650> took an oath יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying פָּקֹ֨ד <WH6485> will surely יִפְקֹ֤ד <WH6485> visit אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וְהַעֲלִתֶ֥ם <WH5927> you and ye shall carry up אֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמֹתַ֖י <WH6106> my bones מִזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> from hence

וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> died יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> So Joseph בֶּן־ <WH1121> old מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> [being] an hundred וָעֶ֖שֶׂר <WH6235> and ten שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> years וַיַּחַנְט֣וּ <WH2590> and they embalmed אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וַיִּ֥ישֶׂם <WH3455> him and he was put בָּאָר֖וֹן <WH727> in a coffin בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> in Egypt
